name: Sydney Central Inn
description:
Sydney Central Inn is Sydney’s newest Affordable budget accommodation truly in the center of Sydney CBD. We are provides upmarket accommodation for budget travellers and backpackers. Sydney Central Inn is a class above regular backpacker hostels providing clean, comfortable accommodation without price of a hotel. 

Formerly known as the Chamberlain Hotel, our beautiful heritage building used to be home for actors and performers playing at the Capitol Theatre. Sydney Central Inn offers 15 well-appointed guest rooms for any Budget Travellers and Backpackers. 

Renowned for superbly located in Sydney’s entertainment and cultural heart. We are located in the center of vast verities of restaurants, bars, and all sources of entertainment at walking distances. At every corner of this central location, life and entertainment await you. 

Our location is only 5 minutes walking from Central Station and Sydney Buses at your doorstep allows the travellers and holiday maker easy accessibility to all of Sydney’s popular attractions

Sydney Central Inn is offer variety of rooms to suit your needs. Our rooms are furnished with a TV and fridge while our clean bathrooms are shared. There are laundry facilities, common kitchen and common room to make your stay convenient and enjoyable. Tour and travel booking services can be book at Sydney Central Inn. Security is our priority, 24 hours camera surveillance is there for your safety and room can only be access by personal security key cards. 

Please note: We cannot guarantee all guests will be booked into the same room if a 4 bed dorm is booked. If you wish to stay together please book a private room.

Also we are offering free WiFi!!!

If this is not enough! Pop downstairs and enjoy relax times at the bar. There are promotions on offer every night of the week and cheap meals or drinks. 

Don’t waste your times. Come stay at Sydney Central Inn. 

** Everything’s you need is right here !! **

Christmas/NYE reservations between December 26 and January 2 are prepaid and non-refundable or transferable. Sydney Central Inn will contact you following your reservation.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Please go to The Pod Sydney Reception on Leverl 6  for check-in. Address: Level 6/396 Pitt Street, Sydney, NSW 2000. 

Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions and concerns.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms: All cancellations or changes to bookings must be made at least 72 hours before the booking date. Insufficient notice will result in a charge equivalent to one night's accommodation.
groupInformation.additionalTerms: On check-in, a key deposit of AUD20.00 must be paid. This is refundable on check-in when you return your key.

houseRules.notes:
All guests are required to present valid photo identification upon checking-in. Sydney Central Inn will accept a Drivers License or Passport only. Guests without valid photo ID will not be permitted to check-in.

Violent, abusive or noisy guests will be evicted without refunds.

Check ins after 11pm will be charged $20 extra. Please be advice of times upon arrival after 11pm by sending us email.

Christmas/ NYE reservations between December 23 2019 to January 3 2020 will be charged on the 1st of December 2019. 

Failed payment may result in cancelled booking, all bookings for this period are non-refundable or transferable.The minimum night stays at Sydney Central Inn is 6 nights during this period. Sydney Central Inn will contact you following your reservation. Travel insurance is always recommended.

The Sydney Central Inn will contact you following your reservation.
--------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to The Pod Sydney Reception on Leverl 6  for check-in. Address: Level 6/396 Pitt Street, Sydney, NSW 2000. 

Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions and concerns.
